name: VIP Elite Tier Onboarding (Hidden)
description: Ultra-premium onboarding for VIP Elite tier ($599/month). Invitation-only, concierge-level service. Hidden from public pricing.

config.subject: {{firstName}}, you've been invited to VIP Elite
config.body:
{{firstName}},

Based on your situation ({{creditScore}} score, {{negativeItemCount}} complex items), I'm personally inviting you to our VIP Elite tier.

**Why VIP Elite:**

Your case requires advanced techniques that go beyond our standard services:

‚Ä¢ Bankruptcy on record
‚Ä¢ Multiple judgments/liens
‚Ä¢ Complex dispute scenarios
‚Ä¢ High-value credit goals ($500K+ home, business loan, etc.)

**VIP Elite includes everything from Premium, PLUS:**

‚úì Bi-weekly strategy calls with me personally
‚úì Advanced legal dispute techniques
‚úì Attorney consultation included ($500 value)
‚úì Same-day response guarantee
‚úì Custom dispute letters (not templates)
‚úì Credit builder loan recommendations
‚úì Mortgage readiness planning
‚úì Business credit setup

**Investment:** $599/month (limited to 5 clients at a time)

**This is invitation-only.** I only work with 5 VIP clients at once to ensure white-glove service.

Interested? Reply to schedule a confidential consultation.

Christopher Williams
Owner, Speedy Credit Repair
(555) 123-4567 (call/text anytime)

config.subject: üåü Welcome to VIP Elite, {{firstName}}
config.body:
{{firstName}},

Welcome to VIP Elite! You're one of only 5 clients receiving this level of service.

**Your VIP Resources:**

All bonus materials: {{vipPortalLink}}

Your private dashboard (enhanced features): {{vipDashboardLink}}

**My direct contact:**
Cell: (555) 123-4567 (call/text 7am-9pm)
Email: christopher@speedycreditrepair.com
Priority line: Press 1 when calling

**This Week:**
Day 1-2: Comprehensive credit analysis
Day 3: Custom action plan delivered
Day 4: Attorney reviews your case
Day 5: First bi-weekly strategy call
Day 7: First custom disputes sent

**Concierge Service:** Text me anytime with questions or concerns. You'll get same-day response, guaranteed.

Let's achieve your credit goals!

Christopher

config.subject: {{firstName}}, VIP Elite invitation still open
config.body:

Interested? Reply or call: (555) 123-4567

config.subject: No problem - here's Premium option
